getAtomicService(String, String, String, String, String, List<String>) - Method in class it.prisma.monitoringpillar.PillarServiceWS
Method useful for having a specific atomic service info (identified by its name) belonging to a specific host, category group.
getIaaSInfo(String, String, List<String>) - Method in class it.prisma.monitoringpillar.PillarServiceWS
Method that wraps Zabbix API in order to provide info about the gruop containing all the monitored hosts, the metrics associated to themselves, as well as trigger.
getMetric(String, String, String, String, String, List<String>, List<String>) - Method in class it.prisma.monitoringpillar.PillarServiceWS
Method useful for having a specific metric info (identified by its name) belonging toa specific host, category group, atomic service which all are to be specified in the request.
getMonitoringIaaSPillar(String) - Method in class it.prisma.monitoringpillar.PillarServiceWS
Method useful for:
creating a host to be monitored
getSpecificHost(String, String, String, String) - Method in class it.prisma.monitoringpillar.PillarServiceWS
Method useful for having a SPECIFIC HOST info (and its characteristics ) belonging to a SPECIFIC Category service regardless of the fact that it could be belonging to a group of host composing a Category service identified by the ID.
getSpecificServiceCategory(String, String, String) - Method in class it.prisma.monitoringpillar.PillarServiceWS
In Prisma PaaS context there are category services such as DBaaS, AppaaS, etc.
getTaggedService(String, String, String, String) - Method in class it.prisma.monitoringpillar.PillarServiceWS
A deployed service might be composed of two or more machines, so that it's needed to call those hosts belonging to the category by searching them by the serviceID attached to themselves at the creation stage.
